metadata.title: CVE-2017-14241 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 6.0.0 allowsremote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via theTitle parameter to htdocs/admin/menus/edit.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
